Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory324.png'}
{3: 'The outline of the refugee camp gradually fades into the distance and the temperature begins to drop rapidly.'}
{3: 'Unlike the wilderness, the few refugees scattered throughout the camp were enough to dispel the cold from their breath alone.'}
{3: 'But now, the cold wind holds you in its frigid embrace.'}
{3: "The heat from your breath condenses into a white fog. The thought of potentially freezing to death spurs you on as you follow the scout's white figure onward."}
{3: "Wanshi's familiarity with the surrounding terrain allows him to adeptly find the most efficient route for conserving strength while also avoiding the Red Tide."}
{3: 'That being said, the trek is still no easy feat for a human.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Why didn't you put on a thermal suit?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's too heavy and hinders movement.", 3: '12'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Why are you willing to throw your life away for someone you just met? You really are somethin' else...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Let's stop for some water. I remember the terrain up ahead. As long as he didn't jump into the Red Tide, we should be right on him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Hmph... No, you're not. Based on how little you've drunk since we left, you need to hydrate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "We may be in a hurry, but if you pass out, then this'll be a lost cause.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Don't mention it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You stop next to a rock formation and rest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Your intermittent daydreaming hasn't been acting up recently, has it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How could you tell?', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I used to be in the medical corps. I've still got an eye for that sorta stuff.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It happens frequently and without warning. The symptoms don't correspond to any disease I recall.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Hmph... Forget I asked. Not like I'm trying to prod you for anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Alright... If that's the case, I'll stop bugging you about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Anyway, I already know about your condition. I won't let it happen when everything is on the line again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why did you bring me out here?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Did you say all of that to me on purpose?', 3: '32'}
{2: "Not just me. It's for Lee as well.", 3: '33'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Heh... Clever.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm starting to see why my Captain thinks of Gray Raven so highly.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's dull expression suddenly turns sharp. His voice no longer carries the same apathetic tone."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Correct. I could have easily found this child by myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Constructs move faster without having to drag a human along.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But you did anyway.', 3: '40'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Because I was curious.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Curious about what caused the Red Tide and the evolution of the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Remain quiet)', 3: '43'}
{3: "Even though you remain quiet, you can't help but think of that colossal nightmare."}
{3: 'The Hetero-Creature known as Polyphages—the same creatures that nearly spelled doom for Gray Raven.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "This is a monster bred by the Ascendants—the Polyphage. It's similar to the Rail Heterozygotes we have encountered before. After preliminary analysis, we've determined that it's also driven by Hetero-Core fragments.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'However, the situation is fundamentally different from that on Akdilek. Even though both are driven by Hetero-Core fragments, the Polyphage is far more complex than the Rail Heterozygote.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's not a Heterozygote, but rather a new type of Punishing creature that simulates organisms on Earth through evolution. In other words, it's a Hetero-Creature.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Although there is no conclusive evidence, we reasonably suspect that the Hetero-Core fragments within it not only serve as the power source for its own existence, but also triggers the Red Tide.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Otherwise, the timing of the two would be too coincidental.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's about the battle with the Ascendants. Information on the Polyphage has been released, but the fact that they contain Hetero-Core fragments is still top-secret.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '【kuroname】, I hope that you can keep the events of what happened underground that day confidential.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Of course, be sure to pass on this message to your team word for word.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory324.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Everyone has been silent about what happened that day...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "But we're scouts. It's not hard for us to piece together the clues.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Not long after we received reports of the victory on the front line...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The surging Red Tide suddenly went "inert."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I beg your pardon?', 3: '71'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You guessed it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Even with the recent surging of the Red Tide, it's become far less turbulent than what it once was.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Even at high tide, the Punishing concentration is far lower that what it once was.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'In other words, the Red Tide has weakened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'What did you do to cause this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your vision fills with the image of the Polyphage completely disintegrating among the radiant glow.'}
{2: "We didn't do anything.", 3: '79', 4: '(Shake head)', 5: '81'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Looks like you aren't trying to hide something.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You still need to keep quiet?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "No matter. Your answer won't have any bearing on my conclusion anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Even if Babylonia isn't willing to disclose any information, there's one similarity with our current situation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Based on their pure concentration of the Punishing Virus, these things are essentially the same as the Hetero-Core encountered in the space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Is the fragment that hit Asslam the only Hetero-Core fragment that fell from the space station?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Alright, never mind. I can tell by the look on your face.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The once inert Red Tide has begun to surge once more into a tributary.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "We can't use conventional rules and logic to infer something like the Red Tide. That being said, we can't completely ignore the underlying meaning, can we?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi turns his head and looks to the west.'}
{3: 'The intricate web of tributaries stretches out to the horizon.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Looking across these tributaries, what do you think we would see at the end of it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'At the time, Babylonia concentrated all its energy on the prism and hit the Hetero-Core with pinpoint precision. Even then, they failed to completely destroy it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'What makes them so confident that a wide-spread attack on the surface will finally put an end to this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'A wider blast means that the damage output to any single target is drastically reduced.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'But what if—and I mean what if—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The Red Tide has a source?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Destroying the source of the Red Tide wouldn't cause it to disappear, but it wouldn't be able to surge relentlessly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Then we would just have to figure out an effective method to combat the Red Tide. We'll eliminate it sooner or later. It's only a matter of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "That's why I need you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Only commandants have the authority to deploy the bit domain node. Right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Your team member, Lee, senses this too.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're far more daring than what I imagined.", 3: '104'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Ah, that's because my Captain told me about something that is written in your student manuals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "As a valedictorian of F.O.S. College, I'm sure you know it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Exceptions prove the rule...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And destroy the battle plan.', 3: '108'}
{2: 'So Chrome has heard that saying, too.', 3: '111'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "He is indeed a top student. That's why he is required to know everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "But if Kamui didn't pester him, he wouldn't have made this an interesting story.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "After all, I'm a sniper.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "The sniper's motto is: reach out and touch someone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I thought you were more indifferent to these things.', 3: '116'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You're right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I don't care about what you're tangled up in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Whether that be with them or with Chief Commander Hans, those poor people are just caught up in the universal values of the past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then why get involved?', 3: '121'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'No reason really.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I know a man who was kind to me, but I couldn't repay him. Until now.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Wanshi's face turns blank as if gazing at an old friend across time and space rather than at the present situation."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Just an outsider from the Golden Age. That being said, he's far more interesting than someone who drowned in the glory of the Golden Age.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi closes his eyes.'}
{3: 'Upon opening his eyes, all of his emotions have been swept away.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmph, enough about this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'There is a solution to everything. Even if it might not be common practice, I just want to use my method to see if it can solve this crisis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I just want all of this to end quickly so I can get some proper shut-eye without having to worry about anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'What about you? Why do you want to get involved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just think that...', 3: '139'}
{2: 'We should never give up hope.', 3: '140'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '...Is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I see. Well, enough about this. Our top priority now is to find the kid.', 4: '1'}
